title: Topic 001 Question 088
body: You are using Cloud CDN to deliver static HTTP(S) website content hosted on a Compute Engine instance group. You want to improve the cache hit ratio.
options: Customize the cache keys to omit the protocol from the key.
Shorten the expiration time of the cached objects.
Make sure the HTTP(S) header ג€Cache-Regionג€ points to the closest region of your users.
Replicate the static content in a Cloud Storage bucket. Point CloudCDN toward a load balancer on that bucket.
